description: This Java source file defines the ServiceStatusPojo class, which implements ObjectIPC. It manages a map of string key-value pairs representing service statuses, and provides methods to manipulate, serialize to JSON, and deserialize from JSON. It is designed to define standard IPC messages for services.

classes.name: ServiceStatusPojo
classes.description: A class representing the service status as a collection of key-value pairs, with JSON serialization/deserialization capabilities.

methods.name: getKeyIterator
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the keys in the status map.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Returns the number of entries in the status map.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves the string value associated with a given key.

methods.name: setString
methods.description: Associates a string value with a key.

methods.name: setInt
methods.description: Associates an integer value with a key, storing it as a string.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the object to a JSON representation.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes the object from a JSON representation.
